dcterms:description: A dataset for suggestion mining from online suggestion forums, containing 8500 examples with 6415 non-suggestions and 2085 suggestions. The validation set has 592 examples, split equally between suggestions and non-suggestions.
dcterms:title: SemEval-2019 Task 9 Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset for suggestion mining from hotel reviews, containing 808 validation examples with 404 suggestions and 404 non-suggestions. The dataset is used for cross-domain classification without labeled training data.
dcterms:title: SemEval-2019 Task 9 Dataset

dcterms:creator: Henning Wachsmuth
Martin Trenkmann
Benno Stein
Gregor Engels
dcterms:description: A dataset of nearly 200k hotel reviews without labels, used for cross-domain classification in suggestion mining tasks.
dcterms:title: Hotel Review Dataset
